hero.title: Easily create official documents with AI
hero.subtitle: Write applications, complaints, CVs and other documents in three languages (Uzbek, Russian, English) in seconds
hero.features: Create, edit and download documents with AI

card1.title: Select document types
card1.description: Choose the required document type and use templates in three languages (Uzbek, Russian, English)

card2.title: Enter context
card2.description: Enter the necessary information for the document or ask AI to create a document

card3.title: Edit and download the document
card3.description: Edit the document created with AI and download it in the required format

templates.title: Document Templates
templates.noResults: No templates found matching your search.
templates.generateDocPrompt: Would you like to generate a new document for:

services.title: Our Services
services.description: We offer a variety of document automation services to help streamline your workflow.

service1.title: Document Generation
service1.description: Automatically generate documents based on your data and templates.

service2.title: Template Management
service2.description: Create and manage document templates for various use cases.

service3.title: Document Analysis
service3.description: Extract and analyze data from your existing documents.

service4.title: Workflow Automation
service4.description: Automate your document workflows from creation to approval.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Our mission is to simplify document creation and management through innovative automation solutions, helping businesses save time and reduce errors.

story.title: Our Story
story.description: Founded in 2023, aidoc.uz was created to address the challenges businesses face with document management. We recognized that many organizations spend countless hours on repetitive document tasks that could be automated.
story.continued: Our team of experts in document processing and automation has developed a platform that makes document creation and management simple, efficient, and error-free.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: We are a dedicated team of professionals with expertise in document automation, artificial intelligence, and user experience design.

info.title: Get in Touch
info.description: We'd love to hear from you. Please fill out the form or contact us using the information below.

form.title: Send us a Message
form.name: Name
form.subject: Subject
form.successMessage: Your message has been sent. We will contact you soon!
